basics.name: Dmytro Smahulov
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software developer with 8 years of experience in designing and implementing dynamic web applications and client-server solutions. Expert in Ruby and Ruby on Rails, with substantial experience leveraging cloud technologies (AWS) and front-end frameworks like React and Vue. Proven track record in both startup and enterprise settings, delivering high-quality software that meets user needs. Passionate about crafting innovative solutions, tackling complex challenges, and developing products that make a difference.

work.name: SoftServe
work.description: SoftServe is the bigest Ukranian digital consulting company.
work.summary: Managed a feature development team at Cisco Secure Endpoint
highlights: Collaborated in designing a cloud-first microservices architecture to enhance the efficiency of development teams.
Delivered intricate business-focused features on a monolithic Rails application within an agile scrum environment.
Built integrations with various security solutions.
Facilitated data migration across multiple data sources.
Involved in building and setup deploy process.
